p: Antiviral drugs and systemic corticosteroids, including neuraminidase inhibitors (Oseltamivir, Peramivir, and Zanamivir), Ganciclovir, Acyclovir, and Ribavirin, as well as Methylprednisolone which reduced the risk of death in ARDS patients [63], [64], [65], are used in the clinic for viral infections. However, they have not been shown to have any effect on COVID-19, thus they are not recommended [66].
